verses.text: The names of the deities that were born in the Plain of High Heaven when the Heaven and Earth began were the deity Master-of-the-August-Center-of-Heaven; next, the High-August-Producing-Wondrous deity; next, the Divine-Producing-Wondrous deity.

These three deities were all deities born alone, and hid their persons. The names of the deities that were born next from a thing that sprouted up like unto a reed-shoot when the earth, young and like unto floating oil, drifted about medusa-like, were the Pleasant-Reed-Shoot-Prince-Elder deity, next the Heavenly-Eternally-Standing deity.
These two deities likewise were born alone, and hid their persons. The five deities in the above section are separate Heavenly deities.

The names of the deities that were born next were the Earthly-Eternally-Standing deity; next, the Luxuriant-Integrating-Master deity. These two deities likewise were born alone, and hid their persons.

So when the Heaven and Earth began, three deities were produced in the Plain of High Heaven, and their names were the deity Master-of-the-August-Center-of-Heaven; next, the High-August-Producing-Wondrous deity; next, the Divine-Producing-Wondrous deity.

The names of the deities that were born next were the deity Great-Male-of-the-Great-Thing; next, the deity Rock-Earth-Prince; next, the deity Rock-Nest-Princess; next, the deity Great-Door-Sun-Youth; next, the deity Heavenly-Blowing-Male; next, the deity Great-House-Prince; next, the deity Youth-of-the-Wind-Breath-the-Great-Male; next, the deity Sea-Deity, whose name was the deity Great-Ocean-Possessor; next, the deity Mountain-Deity, whose name was the deity Great-Mountain-Possessor; next, the deity Moor-Deity, whose name was the deity Heavenly-Elder-of-the-Moor; next, the deity Valley-Deity, whose name was the deity Heavenly-Elder-of-the-Valley.
So when His Impetuous-Male-Augustness had been banished, His Augustness the Deity-Master-of-the-Great-Land went to the land of Izumo. At this time some chopsticks came floating down the stream.

The deity Great-Mountain-Possessor had eighty deities, his brethren, but they all left the land to the deity Master-of-the-Great-Land. The reason for their leaving it was this: Each of them said that the land was a very small one, and they therefore went away to other countries.
